titleStmt.title: One day it was all perfect

publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.head: One day it was all perfect

lg.l: One day it was all perfect
One day everything was good
One day we burnt the circuit
And now I guess I should
On a long reviving night
We struck moonlight on a sun
One day it was all perfect
But now it’s just no fun
One day clicking on it made it better
One day it almost dried
Another fell from rainbows
But now it’s classified
One day the muscle tore
One day it meant no more
One day it was like a moment
and now we’re forced to forfeit
One day it was all perfect
Such a useless sonnet.
One day it was all perfect
One day it was all perfect
